EthernetInterface.longDescription: OpenBMC OEM Extension for EthernetInterface providing static route configuration support.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

StaticRoutes.description: static routes assigned to this interface.
StaticRoutes.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of objects that represent all IPv4 static route addresses assigned to, but not necessarily in use by, this interface.

StaticRoute.description: An IPv4 static route assigned to an interface.
StaticRoute.longDescription: This object shall contain an IPv4 static route address assigned to an interface.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Destination.longDescription: This property shall contain a destination address of static route assigned to this interface.

Gateway.longDescription: This property shall contain next hop an IPv4 address assigned of static route of interface.

SubnetMask.longDescription: This property shall contain the subnet mask for this static route.

title: #OpenBMCEthernetInterface.v1_0_0
